## Discussion points
*Think about these questions on your own, there are no right or wrong answers, and you are free to consult Google or any resources available to you.*

1. Why is it important to that a person who participates in a research study gives informed consent?
2. After you experiment has ended, if your participant insist that they don't want their data included in the study, what should you do?
